about_the_game:
BOOBS: The Ultimate Stress Relief Toy

Relax, unwind, and let go of your daily stress with BOOBS, a uniquely soothing experience designed to bring you the comfort and peace of a woman’s chest.

Features

  • Interactive Gameplay With REAL Body Physics: Use your mouse to manipulate a stunningly realistic pair of beautiful boobs. You can touch and interact with the boobs for a fully immersive stress-relief experience.
  • Nudity: Play with bare breasts! More info about unlocking nudity in-game.
  • Life-like Reactions: Experience realistic responses as she reacts to your actions in real-time.
  • Earn VulvaDollars: With each hour of active play, you earn a VulvaDollar which you can later use to purchase Steam Trading Cards.
  • Calming Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a serene environment, complete with a tranquil blue sky and the gentle, rhythmic sounds of crashing ocean waves.
  • Controller Support: With controller support, enjoy dual-hand interaction through the use of both sticks.
  • Steam Achievements: Gain virtual rewards earned by completing specific milestones or challenges.

Whether you’re seeking to wind down after a tough day or simply want to play with a pair of boobs for some horny fun, BOOBS offers the perfect escape.

Planned Features

  • Steam Trading Cards: Gain Steam Trading Cards by playing BOOBS on Steam, which can be crafted into badges or traded for various rewards.
  • More Interactions: Pinching nipples and grabbing breasts for added gameplay depth.
  • More Toys and live-like reactions: Spice up the interaction with new toys that bring more variety to the experience.

content_descriptors.notes: As of now, there is some nudity in the game. You can undress the character exposing her breasts.
